title: WTB: Looking for PSA Hall of Famers - See List
author: stevieRV

posts.post_title: WTB: Looking for PSA Hall of Famers - See List
posts.post_content:
Hi all,

Made my first post a month or so ago and have met some really great people on here so far. My set has continued to grow. Looking for some of the major HOFers currently. Really trying to stick to a PSA 3-3.5 on these cards. 

I don't check PM's too often so send me an email: [url]simonb@rlspencer.com[/url]

Ty Cobb  -  Green Portriat
Ty Cobb  -  Bat On 
Ty Cobb  -  Bat Off 
Ty Cobb  -  Red Portriat 
Walter Johnson  -  Portriat
Christy Mathewson  -  Portriat
Christy Mathewson  -  White Cap
Nap Lajoie  -  Portriat
Tris Speaker

Thank you for all of the help so far!

S
Still searching! Thanks all for the help so far :)
